mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE ntrip.route (name, start_city_id, end_city_id, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{startCity.cityId}, #{endCity.cityId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: SELECT r.route_id, r.name, sc.city_id AS start_Cid, sc.name AS scity_name, ec.city_id AS end_Cid, ec.name AS ecity_name, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.status FROM ntrip.route r LEFT JOIN ntrip.city sc ON r.start_city_id = sc.city_id LEFT JOIN ntrip.city ec ON r.end_city_id = ec.city_id WHERE route_id = #{routeId}

SELECT r.route_id, r.name, sc.city_id AS start_Cid, sc.name AS scity_name, ec.city_id AS end_Cid, ec.name AS ecity_name, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.status FROM ntrip.route r LEFT JOIN ntrip.city sc ON r.start_city_id = sc.city_id LEFT JOIN ntrip.city ec ON r.end_city_id = ec.city_id WHERE r.name LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT r.route_id, r.name, sc.city_id AS start_Cid, sc.name AS scity_name, ec.city_id AS end_Cid, ec.name AS ecity_name, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.status FROM ntrip.route r LEFT JOIN ntrip.city sc ON r.start_city_id = sc.city_id LEFT JOIN ntrip.city ec ON r.end_city_id = ec.city_id WHERE r.start_city_id = #{startCity.cityId} AND r.end_city_id = #{endCity.cityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ntrip.route SET name = #{name}, start_city_id = #{startCity.cityId}, end_city_id = #{endCity.cityId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status} WHERE route_id = #{routeId}
